SEARCH
Package edu.unomaha.pkischeduler.data.service

Class CRIService

java.lang.Object
edu.unomaha.pkischeduler.data.service.CRIService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.vaadin.crudui.crud.CrudListener<Course>
@Service public class CRIService extends Object implements org.vaadin.crudui.crud.CrudListener<Course>
Service provider which allows the application to access the repositories for Courses, Rooms, and Instructors (CRI)
See Also:

    • CRIService

      public CRIService(CourseRepository courseRepository, RoomRepository roomRepository, InstructorRepository instructorRepository)
      Default constructor.

      courseRepository - The course repository interface.
      roomRepository - The room repository interface.
      instructorRepository - The instructor repository interface.

  • Method Details

    • filterCourses

      public List<Course> filterCourses(String stringFilter)
      Allows courses to be filtered by user input. This function calls the courseRepository to execute a query. The query executed returns a list of courses that match user input.
      Parameters:
      stringFilter - The user input.
      Returns:
      A list of courses that match the user input.

    • filterRooms

      public List<Room> filterRooms(String stringFilter)
      Allows rooms to be filtered by user input. This function calls the roomRepository to execute a query. The query executed returns a list of rooms that match user input.
      Parameters:
      stringFilter - The user input.
      Returns:
      A list of rooms that match the user input.

    • getAllRooms

      public List<Room> getAllRooms()
      This function calls the roomRepository to return all rooms in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all rooms in the database.

    • getAllInstructors

      public List<Instructor> getAllInstructors()
      This function calls the instructorRepository to return all instructors in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all instructors in the database.

    • getAllCourses

      public List<Course> getAllCourses()
      This function calls the courseRepository to return all courses in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all courses in the database.

    • findAll

      public Collection<Course> findAll()
      This function calls the courseRepository Used specifically for the CRUD grid in EditView to return all courses in the database.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.vaadin.crudui.crud.CrudListener<Course>
      Returns:
      A collection of all courses in the database.

    • add

      public Course add(Course course)
      This function calls the courseRepository Used specifically for the CRUD grid in EditView to add a courses to the database.
      Specified by:
      add in interface org.vaadin.crudui.crud.CrudListener<Course>
      Returns:
      A call to the courseRepository to save a course.

    • addRoom

      public Room addRoom(Room room)
      This function calls the roomRepository to add a room to the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the room to be added.
      Returns:
      A call to the roomRepository to save the room to the database.

    • addInstructor

      public Instructor addInstructor(Instructor instructor)
      This function calls the instructorRepository to add an instructor to the database.
      Parameters:
      instructor - instructor The instructor to be added
      Returns:
      a call to the instructorRepository to save the instructor.

    • getDefaultRoom

      public Room getDefaultRoom()
      Provides the default room from the database. All courses are initially set to this room.
      Returns:
      A call to the roomRepository which gives the default room at ID=0

    • exstingInstructor

      public Instructor exstingInstructor(String name)
      Checks to see if an instructor exists by name in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the instructor.
      Returns:
      If the instructor exists, it is returned. Otherwise, returns null.

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
      Deletes all courses and instructors in the database.
